front.title: Disclosing Secure RTP (SRTP) Session Keys with a SIP Event Package

abstract.t: Many Secure RTP (SRTP) key exchange mechanisms do not disclose the SRTP session keys to intermediate SIP proxies. However, these key exchange mechanisms cannot be used In environments where transcoding, monitoring, or call recording are needed. This document specifies a secure mechanism for a cooperating endpoint to disclose its SRTP master keys to an authorized party.
